h2_title: Where to Find the Snow Fox
content: Use Spirits that can deliver heavy hits like Wandering Wight. If you can land the head-smashing Faithful Kowtow move on him, you can knock him completely over. This will stagger him for a moment, giving you the chance to move in quickly to follow up with combos.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snow_Fox_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Snow Fox Questline', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Snow Fox' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Boss - Non-Void'.
The content is as follows:
Use Spirits that can deliver heavy hits like Wandering Wight. If you can land the head-smashing Faithful Kowtow move on him, you can knock him completely over. This will stagger him for a moment, giving you the chance to move in quickly to follow up with combos.
